documents.document: We kicked this off today! Who's next? Reply or fill out the contact at https://t.co/Cyd1SkGECe https://t.co/VGAyofHKi5
@MrsGreatnews yes please!
@ginidietrich yes! Well, sort of. It's pre recorded, right?
@NikCarmichael @KrystleF was brilliant!
@KrystleF @NikCarmichael Yip! Was excellent!
@CateOwen thank you!
@LI_politico thank you!
@LI_politico may I use your posterity images for a Facebook post?
@GlennMcCNZ We answer our phones. Unless we don't want to. What's up?
My ribs hurtðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ https://t.co/Y5i2An3tTj
Come have coffee with us! Our shout, plus you'll get some delicious column inches on our fantastic news site -â€¦https://t.co/I2MgqYO5l2
@westendjenna ha! Me too. I sometimes go one step further and describe what the phone looks like.
@westendjenna they appear to be better than that now.
You need to be fit AF to be a wiggle.
@FlamingAim say that men can or that women are encouraged to apply?
@_abbey_ @CatalystInc Great blog post, but it isn't my role, I was posting on twitter for a friend as they aren't.
@BritInWgtn @DanRockNZ @paolabrett I'm going to delete my tweet as a first remedy. It was just a favour for someone hiring. Thanks!
@BritInWgtn yeah it is. Hence my tweet saying "really keen on women applying".
@BritInWgtn it's a friend's husband. I was just tweeting the role as a favour as they are both not on twitter.
@BritInWgtn it's so confusing. Men can and will apply. The interviewer just really wanted to make sure women felt comfortable to apply too.
Hi Twitter, is it discrimination to say "we're keen for women to apply for xyz job"? Men can obviously apply too. Do I need to say that?
@GalletaPoco is that the one with the brush and it comes in a bunch of colours? #mac #mua
@WhittakersNZ you should see our recycling bin! Full of buttermilk sleeves from end of year stress management!
@AshleyCnz yeah. So disappointing. That bizarre sock comment towards the end gave it away.
@AshleyCnz 4 months. It can't possibly go on longer than that.
@LouHou ugh! How disappointing.
@AshleyCnz isn't it just! Loving all the reports - regardless of how creative they are.
@MsBeeton that face! Oh my stars! ðŸ˜
Is that true about twitter banning Donald?
@kris_bNZ nope. But I think that's what most people think.
Learning about mansplaining. I've had it wrong for ages!
Any chance of a koru pass for tomorrow, @AirNZFairy? Ollie is 3 and heading home to PN for a week break between chemo sessions.
@ianapperley just got my washing in! It's a great time to be alive!
Fox â¤ï¸ https://t.co/gzPFglT0l5
Fecking Thomas.
Can anyone explain what tracks all the different Thomas the tank engine trains go on? One train has locked wheels and won't move.
@Kris_Bartley horrific. There's no need for it.
@Jasonwalls92 Hi Jason, rather than sass, ask them why they didn't pitch you first.
@radiomum I've loved your morning dulcet tones telling me how crap my journey to work will be!
@JoshForde it's more pizza bread he's craving, but I'll definitely suggest it!
@JoshForde good point. Not sure how much he's drinking. I'll suggest it though.
@shagility Thanks!
@JoshForde totally! Wee mite has Leukaemia. Only 3 yrs old. Side effects = pretty pissed off little lad!
@JoshForde he's all about the carbs - craves pizza and marmite sammies. But maybe an ice cream packed full of goodies could change his mind
I have a challenge for you @Giapo! How do you get protein into ice cream for a 3 year old kid on chemo who's not keen on it?
@thefoodnestnz Australis have a powder one that's reasonable, from Farmers and most pharmacies.
Noticed that Briarwood has closed or moved. Any clues, Wellington?
Thank you, #nzsecretsanta! Can never have too much stationery in my line of work ðŸ˜Š
@sillymidoff ðŸ˜‚ but the other thing! ðŸ˜©â˜˜ï¸ðŸºðŸ˜©
Was probably too ambitious to think I could get something from the UK for #nzsecretsanta on time. Sorry, your emergency gift is a bit shit ðŸ˜©
Plan next year's PR in a flash! 3 ways to kick it off, so you can get back to your holiday cocktails! https://t.co/TCiVrWtf6b
@seawall awww! Sleepy baby is adorable! Love it when they have their tiny mouths open while asleep â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
And I'm sorry it sucks. The one I'm trying to make work really doesn't though!
I'm sorry, NZSecretSanta person. Your back up gift is totally not anonymous, so when you go looking for me, you'll see this tweet.
@WendyWings made up jigs are the best!
@yakmoose @nzdodo thank you!
@Hobtwit @websam awesome! Thank you very much!
@AliLeonardMC Thanks Ali! There has to be something in Grafton if not in the hospital itself, eh.
@Hobtwit @websam thank you! Do you think I could load up an account for her with them?
Auckland twitter! My friend from Palmy is headed to starship with her son tomorrow. Is there good coffee and snacks nearby?
@David_Cormack this doesn't surprise me in the slightest.
@atumblingrosie yay! You love Christmas, too!
@NotDrewBroadley Bizarre. Maybe it was an ex staff person? How long ago was this?
@NotDrewBroadley I find that really surprising to hear. The owners are wonderful people.
When you get 20 minutes to get as much as you can from your cafe to help furnish the new one.. #earthquakelifeâ€¦ https://t.co/swmrFML2hW
@westendjenna yeah, I can't and won't give that up. I found I was replacing water with coffee.
@westendjenna just reducing. But going from many coffees a day to one has been like the worst hangover!
@LouDxx but let's be clear. I'm not quitting either of these things, just reducing consumption to a normal level.
I'm currently in caffeine and sugar withdrawal and it's every bit as horrific as you can imagine.
@seawall @GalletaPoco I don't even identify with entrepreneur, certainly not with a mom prefix!
@GalletaPoco @seawall yes! Exactly that. It drives me insane that women in business need a cutesy term to soften the concept.
@seawall @GalletaPoco #ladyboss. Anyone calls me that and they are dangerously close to a slap in the chops. (Virtual, non-violent).
@camtheguzz my sister loves Cambridge too, but was never a fan of big cities. Maybe I just need a bach!
@happymumnz altho.. where are the tiny treats? Taken hostage till you eat the savoury?
Sometimes, I think I'd like living in a small country town. Has anyone made the shift from city to rural, and tell me how awesome it is?
@KendallForbes @matthewjpb that's what I thought I'd read! That he was endorsing their cult! And he was! Ick.
@WendyWings ugh! you're!
@WendyWings oh no! Your very thoughtful tho, Wendy! You'll think of something.
@KateMontgom yes. A highly recommended option!
@KateMontgom @wearewildfang Go NZ Customs site. There's a calculator on there to work it out.
@Kiwimrsmac good idea! Thank you!
@KendallForbes I hope so too! What's really sad is that Tamaki will never stop. Even losing tax free status won't stop him.
@KendallForbes yeah, I mean I wouldn't take a job like that, but you never know what his personal circumstances are.
I have a sports fan for #nzsecretsanta and I'm really stuck for amazing gift ideas! She tweeted about her amazing gift last year! Yikes!
@KendallForbes Well, I expect he has to take the work when it's offered. Christmas time and all that.
Stan Walker joining Destiny? Did I read that right? Or was he a hired act?
@QuotientApp Thanks! It's still a hot mess on my screen. Do you need a screenshot?
@QuotientApp Hey there.. any chance quotient will be fixed soon?
@kiwisharp @Bobux not that big! But for 5yr olds would be great! Can't find anything in a sz 30+
My kid paused his mega tantrum briefly to watch the @nzpost "dancer" tvc before resuming. Do you have all the tvcs on a loop?
@kiwisharp @Bobux Nice one! Looking forward to you designing some fabulous shoes for bigger kids, maybe? ðŸ˜‰
@founderconnz @RuthPretty FancyCon! ðŸ˜‚
This from @ianapperley on the newly launched #WhatisITWellington. Welcome back to WIIW, Ian! https://t.co/AWXMuEAcMB
@JAFJacob @_rajy It's not even a shark navigator. I'd be really upset, too!
Who's at @founderconnz tomorrow? I'm really looking forward to it!
@DearMama_ The hoarders will love that! "Aces! A nappy!" They'll say.
The game is paper dart throwing.
"Whatever points you have, I have more" - Niamh's sports scoring system.
Pancakes = Catholicism. (And a few other things like Christmas and Easter) https://t.co/sqmVOqwsOS
@envycollect yeah! He works at Foxplan!
